nodes.text: Stuart Zissu was a Human male Rebel pilot and the son of the governor of Delantine, Trux Zissu. His mother died before he was twelve.

Zissu was a bit of a rebel and would play space poker with the X-wing pilots while on Yavin 4. In addition, he pulled pranks such as dumping Bassel sea salt into the food, causing the pilots to use up their water rations.
Zissu was a quick study: he learned how to pilot escape pod 4 with only some drawings about physics from 4B-X.
